events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund since this product does not meet my needs.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the content of their message mentioning a return and refund.
The case was assigned to customer support agent Sarah for handling the refund request.
Hello! Iâ€™m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for your order. Could you please provide your order number so I can assist you further?
Please share the order number and any photos of the item you received so we can process your refund more quickly.
Thank you for responding quickly. My order number is 754321 and I have attached photos showing that the item sent is different from what I ordered.
We apologize for the mix-up. I can process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item. Will that work for you?
Yes, that sounds perfect. I appreciate your fast help and I will send the item back as soon as I get the label.
Your refund request has been processed and the prepaid return label was emailed to you just now. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to confirm you have successfully returned the item and received your refund. Please reach out if you have any further questions.
We are closing this case as your refund has been completed and the issue resolved. Thank you for contacting our support team.
